projects.title: Sustainable Development Proposal for Sabarimala and Edathavalam
projects.description: Comprehensive development of infrastructure at Sabarimala and associated Edathavalams (pilgrim shelters) to improve amenities for pilgrims.
projects.impact: Enhanced pilgrim facilities and sustainable development of the temple area.

projects.title: Sabarimala Greenfield Airport
projects.description: Proposed greenfield airport to serve Sabarimala pilgrims and the Central Travancore region.
projects.impact: Improved air connectivity for pilgrims and regional economic growth.

projects.title: Konni Government Medical College
projects.description: Establishment of a new Government Medical College at Konni. Includes Phase I biomedical equipment procurement and Phase II construction of the teaching hospital and allied buildings.
projects.impact: Significant boost to tertiary healthcare in the district.

projects.title: General Hospital Adoor Development
projects.description: Infrastructure development and facility upgradation at General Hospital, Adoor.
projects.impact: Improved healthcare delivery for Adoor taluk.

projects.title: Development of District Hospital Kozhencherry
projects.description: Modernization and infrastructure development of the District Hospital in Kozhencherry.

projects.title: Development of Taluk Hospital Mallappally
projects.description: Construction of new blocks and upgradation of facilities at Taluk Hospital Mallappally.
projects.impact: Better healthcare access for the Mallappally region.

projects.title: Development of Taluk Hospital Ranni
projects.description: Infrastructure development projects at Taluk Hospital Ranni.
projects.impact: Upgraded medical facilities for Ranni taluk.

projects.title: Improvements to Adoor - Thumpamon - Kozhenchery Road
projects.description: Major road improvement project connecting Adoor, Thumpamon, and Kozhenchery.
projects.impact: Improved connectivity and road safety in the district.

projects.title: Improvements to Achankovil - Plappally Road
projects.description: Development of the road connecting Achankovil and Plappally, improving access to forest areas.

projects.title: Improvements to Ezhamkulam - Kaipattor Road
projects.description: Upgradation of the Ezhamkulam to Kaipattor road stretch.
projects.impact: Smoother traffic flow and reduced travel time.

projects.title: Construction of Pandalam Bypass
projects.description: Construction of a bypass road for Pandalam town to alleviate traffic congestion.

projects.title: Aban Junction Over Bridge
projects.description: Construction of an overbridge at Aban Junction in Pathanamthitta town.
projects.impact: Reduced traffic bottlenecks in the district headquarters.

projects.title: New Ranni Valiya Bridge
projects.description: Construction of a new major bridge at Ranni.
projects.impact: Improved connectivity across the Pamba river.

projects.title: New Kozhencherry Bridge
projects.description: Construction of a new bridge across the Pamba river at Kozhencherry on T.K. Road.
projects.impact: Enhanced river crossing capacity and connectivity.

projects.title: Construction of Concord Bridge across Manimala River
projects.description: Construction of the Concord bridge across the Manimala river.

projects.title: Augmentation of WTP at Kalliserry & Thiruvalla
projects.description: Augmentation of 24 MLD WTP at Kalliserry and renovation of 33 MLD WTP at Thiruvalla for Thiruvalla & Changanaserry Municipalities.
projects.impact: Safe drinking water for Thiruvalla and surrounding areas.

projects.title: Construction of Court Complex at Ranni
projects.description: Construction of a modern court complex at Ranni.

projects.title: Blessen George Indoor Stadium
projects.description: Construction of an indoor stadium named after Blessen George in Pathanamthitta.
projects.impact: Promotion of sports and athletic activities.

projects.title: Adoor Municipal Stadium
projects.description: Development of the municipal stadium at Adoor.
projects.impact: Improved sports facilities for the municipality.

projects.title: Koduman Stadium
projects.description: Construction of a stadium at Koduman.

projects.title: Cherukolpuzha - Maniyar Road Improvements
projects.description: Improvements to the Cherukolpuzha - Maniyar road.

projects.title: Kalanjoor Padam Road Improvements
projects.description: Improvement of providing BM & BC work for Kalanjoor Padam road.

projects.title: Improvement of Kavumbhagom - Idinjillam Road
projects.description: Improvements by providing BM & BC to Kavumbhagom - Idinjillam Road.

projects.title: Municipal Office Building Pandalam
projects.description: Construction of office building for Pandalam Municipality.

projects.title: Replacement of Transmission Mains in Pathanamthitta PH Circle
projects.description: Replacement of old water transmission mains in the Pathanamthitta Public Health Circle.

projects.title: Construction of Bridge at Parakkadavu
projects.description: Construction of a bridge at Parakkadavu across Manimala river.

projects.title: Improvements to Manjinikkara - Elavumthitta - Kidangannoor - Mulakkuzha Road
projects.description: Road improvements for the Manjinikkara - Mulakkuzha stretch.

projects.title: Improvements to Valankara - Ayroor Road
projects.description: Road improvements between Valankara and Ayroor.

projects.title: Improvements to Madathumchal - Mukkoottuthara Road
projects.description: Infrastructure improvements for the Madathumchal - Mukkoottuthara road.

projects.title: Improvements to Mannarakulanji - Kozhencherry Road
projects.description: Road improvement works between Mannarakulanji and Kozhencherry.

projects.title: Development of New Arts & Science College Elanthoor
projects.description: Development of infrastructure at the new Arts & Science College in Elanthoor.

projects.title: Improvements to Anayadi - Pazhakulam - Koodal Road
projects.description: Improvements of Anayadi - Pazhakulam - Kurampala - Keerukuzhi - Chandanappally - Koodal road.

projects.title: Modern Slaughter House at Thiruvalla
projects.description: Construction of a multispecies modern slaughterhouse at Thiruvalla Municipality.

projects.title: WSS to Perunadu & Athikkayam Villages (Phase 2)
projects.description: Phase 2 of the Water Supply Scheme to Perunadu and Athikkayam villages.

projects.title: Construction of New Bridge parallel to Vadasserikkara Bridge
projects.description: Construction of a new bridge parallel to the existing Vadasserikkara Bridge across Kallar River.

projects.title: Improvements to Attachakkal - Kumbalampoika Road
projects.description: Improvement works for the 13 km Attachakkal - Kumbalampoika road.

projects.title: Pathanamthitta Cluster (General Education)
projects.description: Phase III of the cluster-based school upgradation project in Pathanamthitta.

projects.title: 5 MLD Sewage Treatment Plant at Pamba
projects.description: Construction of a 5 MLD Sewage Treatment Plant at Pamba for Sabarimala.
projects.impact: Pollution control and sanitation at pilgrimage site.

projects.title: Midway Shelter at Nilakkal
projects.description: Construction of a midway shelter at Nilakkal including a water tank and biogas plant.

projects.title: Parakode Anantharamapuram Fish Market Modernization
projects.description: Modernization of the Parakode Anantharamapuram Fish Market.
